title: WaveSpeed AI - Generate Realistic Shadows for Your Images Instantly

hero.heading: Create Stunning Shadows for Your Images
hero.description: Enhance your photos with realistic shadow effects that bring your images to life.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Add a shadow to the tree, create a shadow for the table...

examples.heading: Before & After Examples
examples.description: Discover how our AI can elevate your images with professional-grade shadow effects.

items.title: Enhance Object Depth

items.description: Add dimension to your photos by generating shadows that match the lighting perfectly.

items.title: Create Realistic Environments
items.imageAlt: Example showing integration of shadows into an environment

features.heading: Why Choose Our AI Shadow Generator?
features.description: Our innovative technology creates shadows that enhance realism effortlessly.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Generate dynamic shadows in seconds, seamlessly integrating with your images.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No design skill required. Simply upload your image and watch our AI enhance it.

items.title: Secure Processing
items.description: All processing occurs in your browser, ensuring your images stay private.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three easy steps to create captivating shadows

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Upload your photo using drag-and-drop or browse your files. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Shadow Generation
items.description: Our advanced AI analyzes your image and adds realistic shadows that enhance depth and realism.

items.title: Download Your Enhanced Image
items.description: Preview the effect with our comparison slider and download your newly enhanced image in high quality.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join a community of satisfied users who enhance their images using our shadow generator

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: The shadow generator brought my architectural photos to life. It's like magic!

items.name: James Smith
items.comment: As a portrait photographer, this tool is essential for creating depth in my images.

items.name: Rachel Adams
items.comment: I love how quickly I can add shadows. It makes my workflow so much smoother!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about our shadow generation feature

items.title: What types of shadows can I generate?
items.description: You can create various shadow styles to fit different lighting conditions, including soft, hard, and dynamic shadows that react to the image context.

items.title: Is it free to use the shadow generator?
items.description: Yes! Users receive 30 free credits daily, with opportunities to earn more through activities. Subscription plans are available for those needing higher volume.

items.title: Can I use generated shadows commercially?
items.description: Paid subscribers can use generated shadows for commercial projects. Free-tier users may use them for personal use only.

items.title: How is my privacy protected while generating shadows?
items.description: All image processing is done directly in your browser with no uploads to our servers, ensuring your images remain confidential.

footer.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Images with Realistic Shadows?
footer.description: Try our AI Shadow Generator now and experience the transformation. No sign-up required.
